main_definition: Insisting that a particular item or group of items must be part of something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To contain or consist of as parts of a whole.
meanings_and_examples.example: The grocery list includes apples, bread, and milk.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To consider someone or something in relation to others.
meanings_and_examples.example: Being part of the debate team includes understanding various perspectives on current issues.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To incorporate a particular element within an existing framework or structure.
meanings_and_examples.example: The new software update includes additional security features to protect against hackers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To comprise as part of something larger or more inclusive.
meanings_and_examples.example: Her collection of vintage postcards includes rare finds from around the world.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To bring along or provide for an event, activity, or situation.
meanings_and_examples.example: The travel package includes transportation, accommodations, and meals during your stay.
